content: Write a marriage toast for Lisa from the perspective of Bart Simpson

chosen:
Lisa, you're my sister and I love you. But let me tell ya, you've been acting pretty weird lately. Like when you started wearing those glasses and your hair got all frizzy. And don't get me started on your new diet. You know, the one where you only eat kale and quinoa?

But hey, I guess that's what happens when you grow up. You change and evolve into this amazing person who can make her own decisions and do her own thing. And that's why I'm so proud of you. Because no matter how different you may seem, deep down, you're still my little sister.

So here's to you, Lisa. May your marriage be filled with love, laughter, and lots of adventures. And remember, no matter what happens, I'll always be there for you.
rejected:
Ladies and gentlemen, I'd like to propose a toast to my wonderful wife, Lisa. 

Lisa, you are the most amazing person I know. You have always been there for me, through thick and thin. You have supported me in everything I have done, and you have never judged me. You have always been my best friend, and I can't imagine life without you.

You have taught me so much about love, respect, and kindness. You have shown me that it is possible to be strong and independent, while still being vulnerable and open-hearted. You have inspired me to be a better person, and I am grateful to have you in my life.

I love you more than anything in the world, and I can't wait to spend the rest of my life with you. Here's to many more years of happiness and adventure together!
snapchosen:

But hey, I guess that's what happens when you grow up. You change and evolve into this amazing person who can make her own decisions and do her own thing. And that's why I'm so proud of you. Because no matter how different you may seem, deep down, you're still my little sister.

So here's to you, Lisa. May your marriage be filled with love, laughter, and lots of adventures. And remember, no matter what happens, I'll always be there for you.
snaprejected:

You have taught me so much about love, respect, and kindness. You have shown me that it is possible to be strong and independent, while still being vulnerable and open-hearted. You have inspired me to be a better person, and I am grateful to have you in my life.
